pkgmetadata.longdescription: BIOM: Biological Observation Matrixhttp://www.biom-format.orgThe Biological Observation Matrix (BIOM) format or: how I learned to stopworrying and love the ome-omeDaniel McDonald, Jose C Clemente, Justin Kuczynski, Jai Ram Rideout,Jesse Stombaugh, Doug Wendel, Andreas Wilke, Susan Huse, John Hufnagle,Folker Meyer, Rob Knight, J Gregory CaporasoGigaScience 2012, 1:7.
